resources.string: Transfer. Option 1 of 2. Select to transfer funds between your accounts at the current market rate
Set rate order. Option 2 of 2. Select to transfer funds between your accounts at a rate you choose.
Your global account balance by currency. Swipe downward to hear more or continue to primary navigation
Graph displaying exposure of foreign currency balances based on your local currency
Your global balance is %1$s %2$s. Swipe downward for currency breakdown or continue to primary navigation
Primary navigation selected. The first option is My FX. Tab 1 of 5. Contains your global currency balances and features to transfer between your accounts
Pay. Tab 2 of 5. Contains options to pay other people
Quick FX. Tab 3 of 5. Contains FX quotes and favourite transactions
Market information. Tab 4 of 5. Contains heatmap, chart, top movers and calculator
Insights. Tab 5 of 5. Contains news and HSBC wealth insights
Pop up. Tap to hear balances by country and account. Continue to next currency balance
Alerts. Button. Set FX rate alerts
More menu, select for alerts, my activity and device settings
My FX heading level 1

Pop up. Tap to select purpose of payment (outward).

Information. Button. Double tap to read information about fees.
Next. Button. Tap to continue.

Close. Button. Tap to exit rate information.

Receive amount %1$s. Tap to input another receive amount.
Charges to be shared. Option 1 of 3. Selected. Swipe to select another option.
All charges to be paid by beneficiary. Option 2 of 3. Tap to select. Swipe to select another option.
Receive amount %1$s. Tap to input another receive amount.

If charges are paid by beneficiary, the amount to credit will be minus the overseas charges. If charges are paid from my account, the amount to debit will not include the charges. If charges are to be shared, local charges will be paid by remitter, overseas by beneficiary. Overseas charges are levied by the intermediary and/or beneficiary banks to facilitate the remittance.
Cancel the payment. Button.
Continue with payment. Button.

5 day chart. Swipe to continue to next period. Double tap for low and high for that period.

FX chart. Graph. Visual representation of FX rate over time period. Interact to select your target rate. Tap and swipe to select next rate. Force touch to set target rate.

Select from account or to account button and double tap to select another account. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Double tap on chart to hear the rate in set your rate or set rate alert area. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select chart area and long press for further action at a specific price. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select base currency button and double tap to change your base currency Double tap to hear more tips.
Select a currency in percentage change and double tap to open FX chart to view market trend. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select a currency and swipe left to remove the currency from the list. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select the contextual menu and double tap to read more actions. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select from amount or to amount field and swipe up to multiply the amount by 10. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select from amount or to amount field and swipe down to divide the amount by 10. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select from amount or to amount field and double tap to input amount manually. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select your rate field and swipe down with one finger to refresh rate. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select a favourite and swipe left with one finger and double tap the remove button to remove the favourite from the list. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
Select set your rate chart and double tap, hold and swipe with one finger to adjust rate and expiry date. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select your rate text field and double tap to edit manually. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select amount text field and double tap to edit manually. Double tap to hear more tips.
Select expiry date text field and double tap to edit manually. Double tap the close button to exit tips.
